articles.title: Mukesh Ambani Brings 7-Eleven Stores To India, First One In Mumbai - NDTV
articles.description: Mukesh Ambani, Asia's richest man, will bring 7-Eleven Inc.'s convenience stores to India, adding to his burgeoning retail empire in the world's only billion-people-plus consumer market that's open to foreign firms.
articles.content:
The first 7-Eleven store will open Saturday in Mumbai.
